metadata.title: CVE-2017-13716 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The C++ symbol demangler routine in cplus-dem.c in libiberty, as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.29, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (excessive memory allocation and application crash) via a crafted file, as demonstrated by a call from the Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd).

notes.note: mdeslaur> This issue is actually a libiberty issue, but there doesn't appear to be a libiberty bug open for it as of 2021-07-30

criterions.comment: binutils package in hirsute is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
